channel.title: CVE Feed for openedx -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for openedx -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-22209|2024-01-13T07:40:44.052Z -- openedx -- edx-platform
item.description: Open edX Platform is a service-oriented platform for authoring and delivering online learning. A user with a JWT and more limited scopes could call endpoints exceeding their access. This vulnerability has been patched in commit 019888f.
